formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Flash' =-
[Synopsis] Flashes a Zap Trunk
[Description] Performs a flash on a zap trunk. This can be used to access features provided on an incoming analogue circuit such as conference and call waiting. Use with SendDTMF() to perform external transfers

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -4,6 +4,7 @@ Flashes a Zap Trunk
[Description] - Flash(): Sends a flash on a zap trunk. This is only a hack for - people who want to perform transfers and such via AGI and is generally - quite useless oths application will only work on Zap trunks. + Performs a flash on a zap trunk. This can be used + to access features provided on an incoming analogue circuit + such as conference and call waiting. Use with SendDTMF() to + perform external transfers

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,10 +1,10 @@ -= Info about application 'Flash' =-
[Synopsis] - Flashes a Zap Trunk + Flashes a DAHDI Trunk
[Description] - Performs a flash on a zap trunk. This can be used + Performs a flash on a DAHDI trunk. This can be used to access features provided on an incoming analogue circuit such as conference and call waiting. Use with SendDTMF() to perform external transfers
